body.p:
Hd Qrs 45 Ky Mtd Infy Vols
Lexington Ky 12 April 1863
To his Excellency Govr Bramlette
Sir
I respectfully reqest that the commission issued to Henry B Brodess as 2stnd Lieut Co "G" 45th Ky Mntd Infy Vols, may be revoked and cancelled for the following reasons --
1st -- He is a resigned officer (14 Ky Infy) and the consent of the War Dept is necessary to his re-commission1 2.
2nd He has not been discharged in orders as is required by Gen Orders -- He being an enlisted man --
3rd -- He has proved himself wholly unworthy of the position --

1. 2. 3. 4
I respectfully nominate Coburn D Outten as 2nd Lieut Co "G" 45th Ky Mtd Infy vice Brodess ^E M. Gates resig^ placing Outten's promotion on the ground of tried service and approved bravery before the Enemy

April 12. 1864
I have the honor to be
Yr Excellency's most obt svt
Jno Mason Brown
Col 45 Ky Mtd Infy

Revoke coms & issue as requested
T E Bramlette

Hd qrs. 45th Ky Infy
45 Infy
Lexington Ky
April 12th 1864
Brown. Jno Mason
Col. Comd

Requests that the Coms of Henry B. Brodess as 2d Lt Co G" 45th Infy be revoked and canceled, as he is a resigned officer of 14" Infty and order of War Dep' is necessary for his recomd and is unworthy of the position. Recommends Corburn D Outten as 2 Lt co G in his place.
Revoke coms & issue as requested "T E Bramlette"
